sentences.en: ‘Shall we go for a walk?’ ‘ Don’t be silly , it’s dark.’
sentences.cn: “我们去散步吧？”“别犯傻了，天都黑了。”

sentences.en: "Silly little boy" was his favourite expression of rebuke to his pupils.
sentences.cn: “愚蠢的小家伙”是他最常用的斥责其学生的言辞。

sentences.en: "There you go again, Dad, with your silly words."— 'Sorry. son.'
sentences.cn: “爸爸，又来了吧，又说傻话了。”——“对不起，儿子。”

sentences.en: All kids her age do silly things; it's nothing to worry about.
sentences.cn: 她这个年龄的孩子都会做傻事，根本不用担心。

sentences.en: At one point we quarrelled, over something silly.
sentences.cn: 我们一度为一件愚蠢的小事吵了起来。

sentences.en: Don'tbe silly.
sentences.cn: 别犯傻了。

sentences.en: From what I know of him he doesn't play silly games.
sentences.cn: 凭我对他的了解，他不会耍滑头的。

sentences.en: God Almighty, Hart, you scared me silly.
sentences.cn: 哎呀，哈特，你把我都吓傻了！

sentences.en: His critics say he's just being silly and petulant.
sentences.cn: 批评家说他就是愚蠢和任性。

sentences.en: I left my keys at home, which was a pretty silly thing to do .
sentences.cn: 我干了件傻事，把钥匙落在家里了。

sentences.en: It is a silly idea and he has botched it.
sentences.cn: 这是个愚蠢的想法，他已经把事情弄糟了。

sentences.en: No, silly, I didn’t mean that.
sentences.cn: 不，傻瓜，我不是那个意思。

sentences.en: Poor Donald's been worrying himself silly.
sentences.cn: 可怜的唐纳德一直在杞人忧天。

sentences.en: Right now the poor old devil's drinking himself silly.
sentences.cn: 这会儿那可怜的老家伙又喝得糊里糊涂的了。

sentences.en: Stop asking silly questions.
sentences.cn: 别再问傻问题了。

sentences.en: That silly old bat. I ask you, who'd she think she was?
sentences.cn: 那个老蠢货。我倒要问一问，她以为她是谁呀？

sentences.en: That was a silly thing to do !
sentences.cn: 那事做得蠢！

sentences.en: They're getting awfully weary of this silly war.
sentences.cn: 他们越来越厌烦这场无聊的战争。

sentences.en: We gave away a silly goal.
sentences.cn: 我们愚蠢地白送了对方一分。

sentences.en: You made a lot of silly mistakes .
sentences.cn: 你犯了许多愚蠢的错误。

phrases.tran_cn: (主英)无聊季节（盛夏时期，报纸因缺少重要新闻而发表小道消息的季节）

trans.tran_cn: 愚蠢的，荒唐的，不实用的
trans.tran_en: not sensible, or showing bad judgment
used to tell someone that you think they are not behaving sensibly
